languages.text: Персонаж с рукопашным оружием лишает противников с дистанционным оружием возможности атаковать, если стоит к ним вплотную. Пистолеты и дробовики являются исключением — их можно использовать в упор.
Characters with melee weapons block adjacent enemies' ability to perform attacks with ranged weapons. Pistols and shotguns are an exception to this rule — those can be fired at point-blank range.
languages.original_text: Персонаж с рукопашным оружием лишает противников с дистанционным оружием возможности атаковать, если стоит к ним вплотную. Пистолеты и дробовики являются исключением — их можно использовать в упор.

traits.locale_text: Characters with melee weapons block adjacent enemies' ability to perform attacks with ranged weapons. Pistols and shotguns are an exception to this rule — those can be fired point-blank.
Characters with melee weapons block adjacent enemies' ability to perform attacks with ranged weapons. Pistols and shotguns are an exception to this rule — those can be fired point-blank.
Characters with melee weapons block adjacent enemies' ability to perform attacks with ranged weapons. Pistols and shotguns are an exception to this rule — those can be fired at point-blank range.
Characters with melee weapons block adjacent enemies' ability to perform attacks with ranged weapons. Pistols and shotguns are an exception to this rule — those can be fired at point-blank range.

Characters with melee weapons block adjacent enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} to perform attacks with {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapons. Pistols and shotguns are an exception to this rule — those can be fired at point-blank range.

languages.text: Los personajes con armas cuerpo a cuerpo bloquean la capacidad de los enemigos adyacentes de atacar con armas a distancia. Las pistolas y escopetas son la excepción a la regla: se pueden disparar a bocajarro.
languages.original_text: Characters with melee weapons block adjacent enemies' ability to perform attacks with ranged weapons. Pistols and shotguns are an exception to this rule — those can be fired at point-blank range.

traits.locale_text: Los personajes con armas cuerpo a cuerpo bloquean la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de los enemigos adyacentes de atacar con armas {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g}. Las pistolas y escopetas son la excepción a la regla: se pueden disparar a bocajarro.

languages.text: 近接武器を持つキャラクターは、隣接する敵が遠隔武器で攻撃するアビリティをブロックする。ピストルやショットガンは例外で、至近距離から撃つことができる。
languages.original_text: Characters with melee weapons block adjacent enemies' ability to perform attacks with ranged weapons. Pistols and shotguns are an exception to this rule — those can be fired at point-blank range.

traits.locale_text: 近接武器を持つキャラクターは、隣接する敵が{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠隔{/g}武器で攻撃する{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}をブロックする。ピストルやショットガンは例外で、至近距離から撃つことができる。

languages.text: 当使用近战武器的角色站在使用远程武器的敌人身边时，该名敌人无法使用能力发动远程攻击。但手持手枪与霰弹枪的角色不会受到影响，使用这些远程武器的敌人可以近距离射击。
languages.original_text: Characters with melee weapons block adjacent enemies' ability to perform attacks with ranged weapons. Pistols and shotguns are an exception to this rule — those can be fired at point-blank range.

traits.locale_text: 当使用近战武器的角色站在使用{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}远程{/g}武器的敌人身边时，该名敌人无法使用{g|Encyclopedia:Range}能力{/g}发动远程攻击。但手持手枪与霰弹枪的角色不会受到影响，使用这些远程武器的敌人可以近距离射击。
当使用近战武器的角色站在使用{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}远程{/g}武器的敌人身边时，该名敌人无法使用{g|Encyclopedia:Range}能力{/g}发动远程攻击。但手持手枪与霰弹枪的角色不会受到影响，使用这些远程武器的敌人可以近距离射击。

languages.text: Charaktere mit Nahkampfwaffen blockieren die Fähigkeit angrenzender Gegner, Angriffe mit Fernkampfwaffen auszuführen. Pistolen und Schrotflinten sind eine Ausnahme von dieser Regel. Sie können auch aus kürzester Entfernung abgefeuert werden.
languages.original_text: Characters with melee weapons block adjacent enemies' ability to perform attacks with ranged weapons. Pistols and shotguns are an exception to this rule — those can be fired at point-blank range.

traits.locale_text: Charaktere mit Nahkampfwaffen blockieren die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} angrenzender Gegner, Angriffe mit {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampfwaffen{/g} auszuführen. Pistolen und Schrotflinten sind eine Ausnahme von dieser Regel – sie können aus kürzester Entfernung abgefeuert werden.

languages.text: Les personnages équipés d'armes de mêlée bloquent la capacité des ennemis adjacents à lancer des attaques avec des armes à distance. Les pistolets et les fusils à pompe font exception à cette règle et peuvent être utilisés à bout portant.
languages.original_text: Characters with melee weapons block adjacent enemies' ability to perform attacks with ranged weapons. Pistols and shotguns are an exception to this rule — those can be fired at point-blank range.

traits.locale_text: Les personnages équipés d'armes de mêlée bloquent la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} des ennemis adjacents à effectuer des attaques avec des armes {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g}. Les pistolets et les fusils à pompe font exception à cette règle et peuvent être utilisés à bout portant.

languages.text: Yakın dövüş silahı kullanan bir karakter, bitişik hücrelerdeki düşmanların menzilli silahlarla saldırı yapma kabiliyetlerini engeller. Tabanca ve pompalılar bu kuralın istisnasıdır. Bunlar kısa mesafeden de ateşlenebilirler.
languages.original_text: Characters with melee weapons block adjacent enemies' ability to perform attacks with ranged weapons. Pistols and shotguns are an exception to this rule — those can be fired at point-blank range.
